price: Watakao geuka baada ya haya basi hao ndio wapotovu.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
footnotes: Anaye kataa kumuamini Nabii huyu baada ya ahadi hii madhubuti ni mpotovu aliye toka kwenye sharia ya Mwenyezi Mungu, ni kafiri mwenye kuwakataa Manabii wote wa mwanzo mpaka wa mwisho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
